name: Matchbox - Original Match 3
description:
An addictive and original Match 3 game.

Make group of at least 3 adjacents tiles of the same color to score.
After each turn, a new row is inserted at the bottom, pushing up everything.
Be careful not to cross the limit, otherwise it's game over!

Throughout the game, gather some coins and spend them on collectible cards.
Complete the collection: 60 unique and original cards await you!

Complete all the challenges!

No ads, no limited gameplay.
